channel.title: Getting Started on Quadlek
channel.description: Recent content in Getting Started on Quadlek

item.title: Basics
item.description: Using Quadlek to build your Slack bot is meant to be straightforward, but understanding the basics will go a long ways to helping you accomplish your goals. Quadlek is built with the fantastic nlopes/slack client. If you run into trouble, or just want to learn more about what you can do I recommend reading their docs. Slack API The Slack API is split into two parts: the web API, and the RTM (real time messaging) API.

item.title: Writing a Plugin
item.description: Now that we’ve gotten a grasp of the basics, we’re ready to write our own plugin! As an example we’ll be building a simple echo plugin that touches each of the plugin components. We’ll get started by creating a new Go package called echo and importing the Quadlek library. package echo import ( "github.com/jirwin/quadlek/quadlek" ) At the high level, all Quadlek needs from a plugin is a quadlek.Plugin. How we create this is up to us, but Quadlek provides a helper function quadlek.
